Package uk.co.spudsoft.params4j.impl

Class ResourceGatherer<P>

java.lang.Object
uk.co.spudsoft.params4j.impl.ResourceGatherer<P>
Type Parameters:
P - The type of the parameters object.
All Implemented Interfaces:
ParameterGatherer<P>
public class ResourceGatherer<P> extends Object implements ParameterGatherer<P>
The ResourceGatherer loads a single resource file, which can be properties, JSON or YAML.
Author:
jtalbut

  • Constructor Details

    • ResourceGatherer

      public ResourceGatherer(String resource, FileType fileType)
      Constructor. The path is passed directly to this.getClass().getResourceAsStream. There is no option for specifying a custom class loader.
      Parameters:
      resource - The path to the resource to load.
      fileType - The type of file to process.

  • Method Details

    • gatherParameters

      public P gatherParameters(Params4JSpi spi, P base) throws IOException
      Description copied from interface: ParameterGatherer
      Collate the parameters that this gatherer understands and combine them with the base object, then return the updated (or new) base object. All known implementations modify the instance of P that is passed in, but callers should not rely on that behaviour.
      Specified by:
      gatherParameters in interface ParameterGatherer<P>
      Parameters:
      spi - Instance of Params4JSpi for accessing common functionality.
      base - Initial value of the parameters that this method will alter.
      Returns:
      Either a new instance of P or the same instance that was passed in.
      Throws:
      IOException - if something goes wrong.
